short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enumerate the canvas components of the page and convert them into PNG/ICO images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enumerate the canvas components of the page and convert them into PNG/ICO images; Automatically remove excess transparent areas from the image, automatically adjust the image to align horizontally and vertically in the center, and automatically package all converted downloads with just one click.
